lg.l: paṇamaha purisottamanāhitaṇayamuhanaliṇavāsiṇiṁ vāṇiṁ
jīē pavayaṇajōnhaṁ sukaïcaōrā parilihanti
sukaïvayaṇa'ṇṇavāō vicittarayaṇāṇi suttirayaṇāṇi
gahiūṇa kaō kōsō aō a gāhārayaṇakōsō
paḍhamaṁ ciya paḍhamajiṇassa namaha nahamaṇimaūharamaṇijjaṁ
aṅkuriamokkhapāyavabīyanihāṇaṁ va payakamalaṁ
paḍivajjantō vi sayā kalantaraṁ nēa jassa muhacinhaṁnnaṁ
pāvaï candō taṁ kamalakulagihaṁ namaha vīrajiṇaṁ
taṁ paṇamaha tiginnicchalaṁ ? ṇa nivasaï nivēsakamalammi
jassa parimāṇanivahō vva bhuvaṇanimmāṇapaḍivannō
paḍhamaṁ ciya dhavalakaōvavīyamamburuhagōyaraṁ namaha
harinijayajaḍharamōkhittanālasuttaṁ piva sayambhuṁ
sēsaphaṇāmaṇidappaṇaviṁvijjantassa kōlarūvassa
dharaṇidharaṇammi hariṇō varāhajūhāiyaṁ namaha
taṁ namaha jassa vacchē lacchimuhaṁ kotthuhammi saṅkantaṁ
dīsaï mayaparihīṇaṁ sasivimbaṁ sūraviṁvammi
rakkhatu vō rōmalayā māyāmahilattaṇē mahumahassa
gūḍhōyaratāmarasāṇusāriṇī bhamaramāla vva
viyaḍasasimaṇḍalāyantasalilabhariyammi bhuvaṇavalayammi
hariṇō hariṇacchāyāvilāsaparisaṇṭhiyaṁ jayaï
taṁ namaha jassa rēhaï viyaḍajaḍāhārapāsapaḍilaggaṁ
raïkalahakuviapavvaïvibhiṇṇavalayaṁ va sasikhaṇḍaṁ
paṇamaha paṇayapakuvviyagōrīcalaṇaggalaggapaḍiviṁvaṁ
dasasu nahadappaṇēsuṁ ēyārahataṇuharaṁ ruddaṁ
taṁ namaha jō jaḍāyaḍalīlāsandāṇiyaṁ samuvvahaï
gōrīkavōlaüvvariyakantisēsaṁ piva mayaṅkaṁ
pamuvaïṇō rōsāruṇapaḍimāsaṅkantagōrimuhayandaṁ
gahiya'gghapaṅkayaṁ piva sañjhāsalilañjaliṁ namaha
nandaü sacchandagaī nimmalapayapūragāravamahagghō
jalahipaḍiruddhapasarō sukaīṇa sarassaīpavahō
āsaṁsāraṁ kaïpuṅgavēhiṁ taddiyahagahiyasārō vi
ajja vi abhinnamuddō vva jayaï vāyāparipphandō
paṇamaha paṇamantamahākaïndasaṅkantanayaṇapaḍiviṁvaṁ
kayanīluppalapūyaṁ va bhāraīcaraṇanahanivahaṁ
taṁ namaha bhāraïṁ jīē caraṇanahadappaṇēsu saṅkantā
bahuvayaṇā hōnti phuḍaṁ paṇamantā takkhaṇē kaïṇō
sarasā vi hu kavvakahā pariōsaṁ kuṇaï kassa vi maṇammi
phullanti na sayalatarū varataruṇīcaraṇaphaṁsēṇa
laliē mahura'kkhariē juvaījaṇavallahē sasiṅgārē
santē pāiyakavvē kō sakkaï sakkayaṁ paḍhiuṁ?
pāiyakavvaṁ paḍhiuṁ gumphēuṁ taha ya kujjayapasūṇaṁyaṁ
kuviyaṁ ca pasāhēuṁ ajja vi vahavē na yāṇanti
cintāmandaramanthāṇamanthiē vitthiyammi atthāhē
uppajjanti ya kaïhiyayasāyarē kavvarayaṇāiṁ
aṇavarayabahularōmañcakañcuyaṁ jaṇiyajaṇamaṇāṇandaṁ
jaṁ na dhuṇāvaï sīsaṁ kavvaṁ pimmaṁ ca kiṁ tēṇa?
kaïṇō jayantu tē jalahiṇō vva uvajī viūṇa jāṇa payaṁ
annē vi jaghaṇā bhuvaṇē kuṇanti ghannāṇa ukkarisaṁ
hiyayāiṁ sajjaṇāṁṇaṁ rañjaï kasiṇēi khalayaṇamuhāṁi
kavvaṁ suhāsiaṁ pi hu jāṇa namō tāṇa sukaīṇaṁ
sālaṅkārāhiṁ maṇōharāhiṁ annunnarāyarasiyāhi
gāhāhiṁ paṇaïṇīhiṁ vi ḍajjhaï hiyayaṁ ayantī hiṁ
chandaṁ ayāṇamāṇēhi jā kayā sā na hōi ramaṇīā
kiṁ gāhā na hu sēvā? ahavā gāhā vi sēvā vi
addhakkharabhaṇiyāiṁ nūṇaṁ savilāsaaddhahasiyāiṁ
addhacchipecchiāiṁ vi gāhāhiṁ viṇā na najjanti
aïcampiya viṇassaï dantacchēēṇa hōi vicchāyaṁ

ḍhalahalayaṁ viya muccaï pāiyakavvaṁ ca pimmaṁ ca
sō sumittu avasari jē āvē, sā sudari jā piara suhāvē
sā lacchī jā dinta na khuṭṭē, sō hu kavitta jō hiyayacahuṭṭē
iti pratau ṭippaṇī
rayaṇēhiṁ nirantarapūriyassa rayaṇāyarassa na hu gavvō
kariṇō muttāhalasaṁsaē hi mayabhimbhalā diṭṭhī
rayaṇāyarassa na hu hōi tucchimā niggaēhiṁ rayaṇēhiṁ
taha vi hu candasaricchā viralā rayaṇāyarē rayaṇā
jaï kahava animmahiō dintō tiyasāṇa rayaṇasaṅghāyaṁ
tā tihuyaṇē vi uvamā na hojja mannēnnaṁ samuddassa
tuhiṇakarasīyalō cciya vaḍavānalaḍajjhiō vi mayaraharō
na muṇijjanti vahantā gaṅgōda … … …
tē aïgahirā phuḍaphēṇapaṇḍurā gāhagajjiraraüddā
sāyaraayatthihatthē ? kattha gayā tuha taraṅgōhā?
jalaṇaṁ jalaṁ ca amiyaṁ visaṁ ca kaṇhaṁ sadāṇavaṁ cēva
uyarē dharanta! mayarahara! tujjha mahima ccia apuvvō
sāhīṇāmaya rayaṇē amaramarōraṁ ca bhuvaṇamakuṇantō
ullasirēhiṁ na lajjasi laharīhiṁ taraṅgiṇīnāha!
iyarō gāmatalāō pūrijjaï pūyarāṇa niyarēṇa
ghaṇamacchapucchaghāyaṁ puṇō vi rayaṇāyarō sahaï
vāraṁ vāraṁ viṇivāriā vi rēvā na sāyaraṁ muyaï
ahavā savvasalūṇē piyammi kō rūsiuṁ taraï?
hiyayanivēsiyavaḍavānalō vi visakulaharaṁ pi jalarāsī
rayaṇāyaru tti lambhaï peccha pasiddhiē māhappaṁ
lacchī dhūā, jāmāuō harī, taha ya paṇaïṇī gaṅgā
amaya-miyaṅkā ya suā ahō! kuḍumbaṁ mahōahiṇō
māhappaṁ taṁ khalu lavaṇimāē jaṁ kila sayaṁ samuddammi
nivaḍanti kūrasattē vi jaḍasahāvē vi sariyāō
jaha jaha sariyāō jalaṁ khivanti taha taha kilammaē uyahī
mahilāhintō riruddhiṁ īhanti kahaṁ mahāsattā?
pūrijjantō vi jalēhiṁ jalanihī jalaharēhiṁ taṇuāi
uvayariyaṁ pi hu uvariddhiēhiṁ garuyāṇa avayariyaṁ
sōsaṁ na gaō, na gaō rasāyalaṁ, jalahi! kiṁ na phuḍiō si?
taḍasaṇṭhiyā vi saüṇā taṇhaïyā jassa vōlīṇā
lacchīē viṇā rayaṇāyarassa gambhīrimā taha jjēva
sā lacchī tassa viṇā kassa na gēhē paribbhamaï?
vihalaṁ paḍicchiuṁ guruyayāṇa payaī, na kāraṇāvikkhā
girisarigalatthiē pattharē vi rayaṇāyarō dharaï
jaṁ atthīhiṁ na pijjaï āsāijjaï na saüṇasatthēhi
taṁ sāyarassa salilaṁ khavanta! vaḍavānala! namō tē
sōsaü ma sōsaü cciya salilaṁ rayaṇāyarassa vaḍava'ggī
jaṁ lahaï jalē jalaṇō tēṇaṁ ciya kiṁ na pajjattaṁ?
pāyālulōyaragaharīhiṁ sāyaralaharīhiṁ jā na ulhaviyā
sā vaḍavānalataṇhā kaha phiṭṭaï sarijhalakkēhiṁ?
kā samasīsī vaḍavānalēṇa iyarāṇa tēyavantāṇaṁ?
ulhaviyasihisamūhō vi indhaṇaṁ jassa mayaraharō
uyahi-vaḍavānalāṇaṁ parapparulhavaṇa-sōsaṇamaṇāṇa
jā vaṭṭaï saṁrambhō tāva suhaṁ jiyaï jiyalōō
du ccēya pattarēhā uttama-ahamāsu purisapantīsu
dintāṇaṁ rayaṇanihī, maggantāṇaṁ tu vaḍavaggī
sō kō vi guṇō gōvāliyāṇa jaï natthi kanha! ekkō vi
ujjayasīlāvasarē taha vi hu mā viviṁbharijjāsu
uya ūḍhabhuvaṇabhārō vi kēsavō sihibharēṇa rāhāē
kuvalayadalaṁ va tuliō, haluijjaï kō na pimmēṇa?
kisiō si kīsa kēsava! jaṁ na kaō dhannasaṅgahō mūḍha!
kattō maṇapariōsō vi sāhiyaṁ bhuñjamāṇassa?
saccaṁ cēya bhuyaṅgī vi sāhiyā kira visāhiyā kaṇha!
sāhīṇaviṇayapaṇaō vi jīē ghummāviō taṁ si
kasiṇē vi jalē kaṇhassa kāliō phaṇimaṇīhiṁ uvadiiṭṭhō
dēhuppannā vi visaṁvayanti divvē parāhuvuttē
uppajjanti cayanti ya bahusō jalamāṇusīō jalahimmi
sā lacchī vacchayalaṁ alaṅkiyaṁ jīē kanhassa
jalanihimukkēṇa vi kutthuhēṇa pattaṁētaṁ murāriṇō hiyayaṁ
tēṇa uṇa tammi ṭhāṇē na yāṇimō kiṁ pi viṇihittaṁ
sō saggō sā lacchī tāiṁ vatthāiṁ tē alaṅkārā
rāhāpalōyahīṇāḍīsā hariṇō hiyaē khuḍukkhuḍaï
hiyayāu jā na mukkā, ahamāṇa vi saṅgayaṁ aṇucarantī
kaṇhassa tīē lacchīē paḍikayaṁ kiṁ nu kāyavvaṁ?
jattha sasikantakavisīsayaṅkiō sūrakantamaṇisālō
ravisasisasi-ravisaṅgē parihājalāiṁ sōsēi pōsēi
parihājalasaṅkantō maragayasiharaṅkiō phalihasālō
sahaï jahiṁ jalahijalantasēsasayaṇatthaviṇhuṇhō vva
siyakarakiraṇanirantaraphurantasasikantasālabhañjīhi
rayaṇīsu tiyasabhavaṇāiṁ jattha dhārāgihāyanti
païdiyahaṁ vilasantē daṭṭhuṁ gōrī-mahēsarē jattha
kuḍḍēṇa āgaō himagiri vva dhavalō sahaï sālō
jattha maṇibhavaṇabhittīsu picchituṁ attaṇō vi paḍibimbaṁ
paḍijuvaïsaṅkirīō piēsu kuppanti muddhāō
jattha'cchaphalihabhūmisumī sālattayataruṇicaraṇapaḍibimbaṁ
cubanti muddhabhasalā jalavilasirakamalabhantīē
jattha anīiparāiṁ khettāiṁ cēva na uṇa sappurisā
dīsanti diyavara cciya kusā''saṇaggahaṇatallicchā
vilayāulāiṁ vitthinnapattapunnāiṁ pavarasālāiṁ
jattha bhavaṇāiṁ majjhē, vaṇāiṁ vāhiṁ virāyanti
nīlamaṇikuṭṭimē jattha navavahū picchiūṇa saṅkantaṁ
samuhaṁ taggahaṇatthaṁ hatthaṁ kamalabbhamā khivaï
gharasirapasuttakāmiṇikavōlasaṅkantasasikalāvalayaṁ
haṁsēhiṁ ahilasijjaï muṇālasaddhāluēhiṁ jahiṁ
icchanti na nēhalavaṁ, sakajjalaggā na hōnti maṇayaṁ pi
amuṇiyadasāvisēsā suyaṇā rayaṇappaīva vva

chāïllō
dīpārthē — dēśī iti pratau ṭippaṇī piyaï tamaṁ, taṁ ca ?u uvvamaï kajjalamisēṇa
annē vi suisahāvā hiyaē kalusaṁ na hu dharanti
daḍharōsakalusiassa vi suaṇassa muhāō vippiyaṁ kattō?
rāhumuhammi vi sasiṇō kiraṇā amayaṁ ciya muyanti
pisuṇō aïdittaggī nēhasahassāiṁ jhatti jō jaraï
suyaṇō uṇa mandaggī ekkaṁ nēhaṁ na jō jaraï
vimalēṇa vi kaha uvamā ekkasarūvassa suyaṇahiyayassa
phalihōvalēṇa kīraï āsayavasabhinnarūvēṇa?
abhaṇantāṇa vi najjaï pariṇāmaṁ supurisāṇa cariēhiṁ
kiṁ jampanti maṇīō jēṇa sahassēhiṁ ghippanti?
paḍivannapakkhavāō guṇasañjuttō samujjaō saphalō
bāṇō vva hiyayalaggō māraï suyaṇō adīsantō
cāvaguṇāṇaṁ duṇhaṁ rēhanti mahāṇubhāvacariyāiṁ
ūharasamuṇṇayāṇaṁ kōḍīō dinta-lintāṇaṁ
sahaï samūlāṇa samuṇṇayāṇa vahusaüṇasatthanilayāṇa
sappurisāṇa dumāṇa va parōvayārapphalā riddhī
sō jayaü jēṇa suyaṇā vi dujjaṇā iha viṇimmiyā bhuvaṇē
na tamēṇa viṇā pāvanti candakiraṇā vi parabhāgaṁ
taṁ parivaḍūḍhanti khaṇaṁ khaṇaṁ pi nivasanti jattha sappurisā
jāō kalimmi jassiṁ taïṁ uṇa sō cēva niṭṭhaviō
kalahantāṇa vi na hu niggayāiṁ, hiyaē jaraṁ aïgayāiṁ
suyaṇakayāiṁ rahassāiṁ dahaï āukkhaē aggī
khajjanti ṭasa tti na bhañjiūṇa, pijjanti nēya ghuṇṭēhiṁ
taha vi hu kuṇanti titti ālāvā sajjaṇajaṇassa
īsiṁ pi na lakkhijjaï suttaṁ hārēsu muttiutthaïyaṁ
suguṇā vi guṇabbhahiēhiṁ antarijjanti kiṁ cojjaṁ?
kalikālakavalanovvariyasupurisā santi kattha va paēsē
vīyaṁ va kayajuyatthē ajja vi parirakkhiyaṁ vihiṇā
pasamiyasōhāsasaharassa'llīṇassa vaṅkimā jaṁ sē ?
riddhīsu pañjalā hōnti supurisā, na ya vivattīsu
viralā uvayariūṇaṁ niravekkhā jalahara vva vaccanti
jhijjhanti tāṇa virahē virala cciya saripavāhō vva
santiatthi asaṅkhā saṅkhā dhavalā rayaṇāyarubbhavā bhuvaṇē
na hu tāṇa saddaladdhī jāyā jā pañcajaṇṇaṇhassa
chinnāṇa sōsiyāṇa ya dāhaṁ pattāṇa chiddabhariyāṇa
ahamamuhadūsiyāṇa vi suhō u saddō suvaṁsāṇa
hiyaē jāō, nōna cēva pasariō, nēya payaḍiō lōē
vavasāyapāyavō supurisāṇa lakkhijjaï phalēhiṁ
na hu mahumahassa vacchē, matthē kamalāṇa, nēya khīrōē
vavasāyapāyavē supurisāṇa lacchī phuḍaṁ hōi
sabbhāvakhalāṇa vi kuṇaï kiṁ pi suyaṇattaṇaṁ suyaṇasaṅgō

jhīṇassa vi kajjalam
īṣat iti pratau ṭippaṇīīsi ghaḍaïīsi yassa ghaḍaï ṇayaṇassa lāyaṇṇaṁ
saccariyanimmalāṇaṁ aliaparāṇa vi sirīō vaḍḍhanti
sacchiddāṇaṁ muttāṇa rāyavacchatthalārōhō
kiṁ ittiēṇa gayaṇaṅgaṇassa garuattaṇaṁ samōsaraï?
saajjaṇahiyayassa na jittitēēṇa sarisāiyaṁ tēṇa
suyaṇō tusārasarisō tāvijjantō vilāi, na hu jalaï
iyarō dīvayasarisō kayanēhō jalaï ahiayaraṁ
suyaṇattaṇaṁ na kēṇa vi antōmaliṇāṇa tīraē kāuṁ
sīsēṇa vahantassa vi harassa vaṅkō cciya mayaṅkō
purisā jē guṇarahiyā kulēṇa gavvaṁ vahanti tē mūḍhā
vaṁsuppaṇṇaṁ pi dhaṇu guṇarahiaṁ bhaṇaha kiṁ kuṇaï?
guruā vi jēsu maḍahā saṅkantā dappaṇēsu dīsanti
juttamiṇaṁ jaṁ dijjaï jaṇēṇa chāraṁ muhē tassa
purisāṇa kulīṇāṇa vi na kulaṁ viṇayassa kāraṇaṁ hōi
candā'maya-lacchisahōyaraṁ pi mārēi kiṁ na visaṁ?
jaha kaṇayaṁ taha parimāṇapattharaṁ bē vi tulaï nārāō
ahavā nirakkharāṇaṁ guṇa-dōsaviyāraṇā kattō?
dōmuhaṁ! nirakkhara?ya! lōhamaïya! nārāya! kittiyaṁ bhaṇimō
guñjāhiṁ samaṁ kaṇayaṁ tulanta na gaō'si pāyālaṁ
viddaviyaguṇō dōsekkapāyaḍō nēhakhavaṇatattillō
dīvō vva khalō āsannasaṇṭhiō kaṁ na maïlēi?
sajjaṇasaṅgēṇa vi dujjaṇassa na hu kalusimā samōsaraï
sasimaṇḍalamajjhapariṭṭhiō vi kasiṇō cciya kuraṅgō
guṇalēsō vi ?ya na suyaṇa! tujjha ghaḍantassa kiṁ pi uvvariō
mannē dōsamaō cciya tēṇa jaē dujjaṇō ghaḍiō
maliṇāyāraṁ daṭṭhūṇa maṇḍalō bhasaü tassa na hu dōsō
duṭṭhakhalō aparokkhē vimalasahāvāṇa vi bhasēi
vasaï jahiṁ cēva khalō pōsijjantō vi nēhadāṇēṇa
taṁ cēva ālayaṁ dīvaō vva acirēṇa maïlēi
akulīṇō dōmuhaō tā mahurō bhōyaṇaṁ muhē jāva
muraō vva khalō jinnammi bhōyaṇē virasamārasaï
niddhammō guṇarahiō cāvavāṇavimukkō ya loddasambhūō
vindhaï jaṇassa hiyayaṁ pisuṇō vāṇa vva bhaggantō
na saddaï abbhatthaṇiyaṁ, asaï gayāṇaṁ pi piṭṭhimaṁsāiṁ
daṭṭhūṇa bhāsuramuhaṁ khalasīhaṁ kō na vīhēi?
khalasaṅgē paricattē pecchaha tellēṇa jaṁ phalaṁ pattaṁ
mayaṇāhisurahivāsaṁ pahusīsaṁ pāviyaṁ tēṇa
hōhī khalu tti kaliūṇa ṇiyamaṇē māmi jantadiyaēhi
pattēhiṁ navari mukkō phaliō vi tilō avēvakkhāē
sō saddō, taṁ dhavalattaṇaṁ ca, rayaṇāyarammi uppattī
saṅkhassa hiyayakuḍilattaṇēṇa savvaṁ pi pabbhaṭṭhaṁ
mēhā iva dōjīddā payaṁ samāsāiūṇa aïkalusā
sacchandagamaṇasīlā sayalaṁ pi jaṇaṁ kayatthanti
suyaṇō muhā kilammaï, haraï khalō jjēva navara pahuhiyayaṁ
taruṇō phalāi gahiuṁ taraï kaī, na uṇa pañcamuhō
lahuvittassa vi pahuṇō garuyā līyanti suddhahiyayassa
maḍahē vi dappaṇē saṅkamanti garuā vi gayavaïṇō
tēyassīṇa pasāō lahū vi viyaḍaṁ ghaḍēi mahimāṇaṁ
ekkēṇa vi ravikiraṇēṇa gayaṇamakkamaï hariṇaṅkō
pagaïkhalēsuṁ pi piyaṁvaēsu pahuṇō vahanti pariōsaṁ
kuḍilahiyayassa saṅkhassa haraï hiyayaṁ sarō muharō
unnayasihō vi dīvō na haṇaï hiṭṭhaṭṭhiyaṁ timiraniyaraṁ
ahavā'bhimāṇamukkaṁ pahuṇō pālēnti riuvaggaṁ
nīyā vi samatthēhi gahiyā uccaṁ lahanti saṇṭhāṇaṁ
dhūlikaṇā puhavīē caranti gayaṇammi vāēṇaṁ
hiṭṭhaṭṭhiyajaḍaniyaraṁ taha ya supattāiṁ uttamaṅgammi
jaha dharaï tarū taha jaï pahū vi tā kiṁ na pajjattaṁ?
na vimiṇā jaṁ sahaï guṇō vi, sahaï dōsō vi jīē pariyariō
kammaṇamēgaṁ bhuyaṇassa saraha taṁ bhayavaïṁ lacchiṁ
guṇagaruyāṇa vi dhaṇavajjiyāṇa na havanti citiyā atthā
lakkhēṇa vi dīvāṇaṁ na diṇaṁ diṇanāhavirahammi
lacchī-sarassaīṇaṁ lacchī garuī, sarassaī lahuī
iharā kahamīsaramaṇusaranti sampamnavijjā vi
lacchīē guṇā niyamēṇa hōnti, na guṇēhiṁ havaï puṇa lacchī
vijjūō khalu samēhā havanti, mēhā na saha vijjū
aïsīyalakarapasarō jāō sampuṇṇamaṇḍalō rāyā
iya cintiūṇa lacchī savvaṅgaṁ tammi nivasēi
lacchīlayāi mūlaṁ guṇa-sattipayaṁ pariṭṭhiyaṁ lōē
jēṇa ahōgamaṇaṁ cēva tāṇa parivaḍḍhaṇē tīē
dintāṇa dāṇamēva hi saṁsakai, na ya paribhavaṁ kuṇaï kō u
dāṇēṇa virahiāṇaṁ na ḍhalaï lōgō karīṇaṁ pi
kōḍiṁ dintā vi namanti, maggaṇatthaṁ dharanti jē jīyaṁ
tāṇa dhaṇūṇa va purisāṇa kaha ṇu mā hōu ṭaṅkārō
sō vaṁsaguṇō cciya ēsa kō vi cāvāṇa phuriyasārāṇa
jaṁ guṇamukkāṇa vi maggaṇāṇa lakkhaṁ samappanti
cāvāṇa navari ekkāṇa sahaï cāruttaṇammi ṭaṅkārō
sahalō maggaṇanivahō visajjiō jēṇa namiūṇa
dintō jalaṁ pi jalaō sa vallahō hōi sayallōyāṇaṁ
niccaṁ pasāriyakarō karēi mittō vi santāvaṁ
dinti phalāiṁ jahicchaṁ kappadumā, nēya kipi jampanti
dhūmaliyajalaharā pāṇiyaṁ pi dāūṇa gajjanti
lahaï garuyattaṇaṁ ciya dintāṇa karō vimukkadāṇō vi
acchariyaṁ lahuyāyaï suvaṇṇabhariō vi lintāṇaṁ
na vi taha dūmēi maṇaṁ gayassa vandhō vva kariṇivirahō vva
dāṇaviōyavimuhiē jaha bhamaraülē bhamantammi
jō sahaï samaramajjhē muṇālalīlāē paharaṇasayāiṁ
nūṇaṁ dāṇāvasarē tassa vi hiyayaṁ camakkēi
jaḍasaṁsaggullasiō vilasantō virasavāṇiō niccaṁ
payaḍiyavahuvihadōsō kiṁ jalahī? na hi, kusāmī vi
palaē mahāguṇāṇāṁ havanti sēvārihā lahuguṇā vi
atthamiē diṇanāhē ahilasaï jaṇō paīvaṁ pi
ōlaggiō'si dhamma'mha hojja iṇhiṁ naḍida! vaccāmō
ālihiyakuñjarassa va tuha dāṇaṁ kēṇa vi na diṭṭhaṁ
jē kēi pahū mahimaṇḍalammi tē ucchudaṇḍasāricchā
sarasā jaḍāṇa majjhē visamā pattēsu dīsanti
iṇhimpahuṇō pahuṇō pahuttaṇaṁ, kiṁ cirantaṇapahūṇaṁ?
dōsaguṇā guṇādōsā jēēhiṁ kayā, na hu kayā tēhiṁ
appāyattaṁ sampayamavaṇēi pahū parammuhō, na guṇaṁ
ṭhāṇaṁ uvari nirumbhaï maṇīṇa jalahī, na uṇa chāyaṁ
tōsō maṇassa kassa vi āvaïpaḍiyammi bhiccavaggammi
sariyāmu dariddāsuṁ sariyāddivaī samullasaï
acchaü kā vi apuvvā riddhī tārāhivassa riddhīsu
jā kā vi purāṇā tārayāṇa riddhī hayā sā vi
suhiē suhiyāiṁ ravimmi, dukkhiē dukkhiyāiṁ kamalāiṁ
taha vi hu na tēṇa tāṇaṁ avayariō paṅkayakalaṅkō
jaha jaha pāvanti payaṁ unnayamunnayayaraṁ diṇayaru vva
lahūībhavanti santāvayanti taha taha daḍhaṁ kēī
tārāvaïṇā jaṁ tārayāṇa riddhēṇa nihaṇiyā riddhī
sayalakalāṭhāṇassa vi tēṇaṁ ciya jhijjhaē lacchī
parivārāṇaṁ suyaṇattaṇaṁ pi pisuṇē pahummi na hu kiṁ pi
paḍikūlammi ravisuē suhā vi avarē gahā vihalā
mahumāsavāsarāṇaṁ niḍālasañjaṇiyasēyabindūṇaṁ

kāṇa vi parivuḍiḍhamahīyalassa santāvamāvahaï
prastutasavāditē imē gāthē pratau ṭippaṇīrūpēṇa vidyētē —
parapatthaṇāpavanna mā jaṇaṇi! jaṇēsi ērisaṁ puttaṁ
uarē vi mā dharijjasu patthaṇabhaṅgō kaō jēṇa
mōṇa kālavilabō uccaddiṭṭhī paramsuha vayaṇaṁ
bhiuḍī atallāvō nakkārā chavvihā huti
akayavvaō na sōhaï vihavō vihavō vva aṅgaṇānivahō
kattha vi apattabhōgō suvaṇṇatāruṇṇaō bhavajāyai
kiṁ vaṁsēṇa guṇēṇa ya? kiṁvā kōḍīē? tujjha rē cāva!
jāyanti jassa puraō maggaṇayā mukkasikkārā
kasiṇaṁ kāūṇa muhaṁ, pacchā rattaṁ muhēṇa hōūṇaṁ
diṇṇaṁ phalaṁ palāsēṇa taṁ pi saüṇēhiṁ paricattaṁ
lōhamayassa vi maliṇassa gāḍhamuṭṭhissa kōsanirayassa
kivaṇassa kivāṇassa ya āyārēṇēva bhiṇṇattaṁ
andhāriūṇa vayaṇaṁ dīhaṁ rasiūṇa māmikhatthēhiṁ ?
paüraṁ pi kahava diṇṇaṁ jalaēṇa jalaṁ alaṁ tēṇa
kariṇō harinaharavidāriyassa dīsanti muttiyā kumbhē
ahava kivaṇāṇa maraṇē payaḍa cciya hōnti bhaṇḍārā
dīsanti jōyasiddhā, añjaṇasiddhā tahēva dīsati
dāliddajōyasiddhā pāsē vi ṭhiyā na dīsanti
mahurollāvasalūṇō laliyapaō rūvajāiparisuddhō
taaha vi na agghaï adhaṇō paccakkhakaīṇa kavvaṁ va
uppajjanti tahiṁ ciya, viyasanti tahiṁ, tahiṁ vilijjanti
puṇṇasarē kamalāiṁ va maṇōrahā rōrahiyayammi
santā vi guṇavisēsā narāṇa payaḍā havanti tā kattō
jātāṇa dappaṇāṇa va kaō ṇa bhūīē sakkārō?
jē jē guṇiṇō jē jē ya māṇiṇō jē viḍhattavinnāṇā
dālidda! rē viyakkhaṇa! tāṇa tumaṁ sāṇurāō si
santavaï gasaï savvaṁ jaï vi hu dhūmēṇa paḍhamamandhēi
uarabharaṇatthiṇō taha vi niccamagaṇiṁ aṇusaranti
santā vi guṇā guṇavantayāṇa dāliddatamabharakkantā
atthojjōēṇa viṇā payaḍā vi na pāyaḍā hōnti
appāṇaṁ ciya dubharaṁ jāṇa jaē ki va tēhiṁ jāēhiṁ?
susamatthā vi ya na parōvayāriṇī tē vi na kiṁ pi
lacchīkarakamalaviyāsarēṇupūrijjamāṇanayaṇēhiṁ
dīsanti nēya rōrā puraō vi ṭhiyā dhaṇaḍḍhēhiṁ
haraï parihīṇavihavassa nūṇa niyapaṇaïṇō vi appāṇaṁ
savvaṅgamasampuṇṇassa ghaḍaï na hu jāmiṇī sasiṇō
dhīrāṇa ramaï ghusiṇāruṇammi na tahā piyāthaṇucchaṅgē
diṭṭhī riugayakumbhatthalammi jaha bahalasindūrē
sō kēṇa vijjhavijjaï vīrapayāvānalō tiṇikkhantō?
uppattikāraṇaṁ jassa khaggadhārājalō ccēya
sāvikkhō dahavayaṇō varappayāṇēṇa sāhasukkarisō
santē vi karasamūhē ekkekkaṁ jō siraṁ luyaē
supaōharāē suhaḍō pulayasaṇāhāi khaggalaṭṭhīē
jāyaï maülianayaṇō daïāi va kaṇṭhalaggāē
ikkattō ruyaï piyā aṇṇattō samaratūranigghōsō
nēhēṇa raṇarasēṇa ya bhaḍassa dōlāiyaṁ hiyayaṁ
ajja vi vihurammi pahū ajja vi paharanti vaïrisaṅghāyā
ajja vi majjhatthā jayasirī vi rē jīva! mā vacca
taṁ natthi jaṁ na sijjhaï vavasāyasamujjayassa dhīrassa
jaṁ sīsamettasēsō rāhū sasi-diṇayarē galaï
aghaḍiyaparāvalavā jaha jaha garuyattaṇē na vihaḍanti
taha taha garuāṇa havanti baddhamūlāō kittīō
diggayakaōlaviyaliyamayapaṅkāmōyavāsiyamaṇassa
bhasalassa kaṇṇatālāhayassa maraṇaṁ pi ramaṇijjaṁ
khaggammi nivāsō jayasirīē, samarammi hōi sā hatthē
hatthaṭṭhiē vi vihavē vimukka dhīrā visūrinti
vivarummuhā vi garuyā uvayārī hōnti sayalalōyassa
kummēṇa niyayapiṭṭhiṭṭhiyaṁ pi bhuvaṇaṁ samuddhariyaṁ
cittuttinnō vi tulāgaō vi mittō tahā vi na hu mukkō
kō hariuṁ tassa nahaṅgaṇassa gambhīrimaṁ taraï?
sabbhāvaṁ pahuhiyaē, jīyaṁ saggē, jasaṁ jaē sayalē
ṭhaviūṇa raṇē sīsaṁ kayakajjō nacciō suhaḍō
kulamuddharanti ēgē vaḍavīyakaṇaṅkurēṇa sāricchā
annē vālayasarisā jāyā mūlaṁ viṇāsanti
kaha nāma sahijjaï kāyarēṇa samuhintagayaghaḍāvīḍhē
garuyagayacalaṇacampiyakarōḍikaḍuō kaḍakkārō?
tuṅgattaṇaṁ gayandē saṅgarasārattaṇaṁ ca kēsariṇō
saṅgāmasūrimā tuṅgimā ya sarabhē samappanti
mahiūṇa mahājalahiṁ mahumahaṇō tattha suyaï vīsatthō
ēyaṁ nīiviruddhaṁ, chajjaï savvaṁ samatthāṇaṁ
ummūlēi na pavaṇō tiṇāiṁ kila uṇṇaō asārāiṁ
bhañjēi mahallatarū, garuyā garuē virōhanti
dhīrō arikarikumbhayaḍapāḍaṇocchaliyamottiyacchuriō
rēhaï raṇammi jayasirisiyakkhaēhiṁ va ahisittō
samarē dhārāgōyara muñcanti vēvirimaṇḍalaggēṇa?
taṁta tammi valā khalu nivasirīē lacchīē vippanti
saccaṁ kalānihi cciya candō tēyammi jō paṇaṭṭhammi
pavasiyatavaṇassa vi gayaṇacakkamakkamaï pāēhiṁ
païṇō sulahāiṁ dhāṇāiṁ dinti, pattī ya dinti puṇa pāṇē
garuyattaṁ taha vi paīṇa na uṇa pattīṇa, acchariyaṁ
suhaḍāṇa samaravajjantatūravararavaṇaghaṇajalāsittō
pulayacchalēṇa ucchāhamahiruhō muyaï kisalāiṁ
sattūṇa pāyavīḍhē luḍhanti māṇaṁsiṇō vi jaṁ kaha vi
taṁ abbhatthinti mahiṁ vivaraṁ pāyālagamaṇatthaṁ
hiyaïcchiamalahantō pañjarasaüṇu vva dhīravavasāō
kōsasayasampuḍa?niruddhapasarō taḍapphaḍaï
uvvahasi kīsa gavvaṁ ettha jaē gayavaī ahaṁ ekkō?
tuha vēriyāṇa naravaï! mahilāsatthāccā vi gayavaïṇō
nūṇaṁ dhaṇummi tuha pahu! saṅkamaï vivakkhajīviyaṁ samarē
iharā tammi sajīvē kaha riuṇō hōnti ajjīvā?
sampuṇṇakōsadaṇḍaṁ jaladuggagayaṁ pi ḍhadalaï kamalavaṇaṁ
diṭṭhammi jammi, kaha sō sūrō? mā bhuvaṇamakkamaü
vahulakkhaēṇa vahusō mahāpasāēṇa tujjha naranāha!
paṇaïsamūhō candō vva vandaṇijjō jaē jāō
tuha riuṇō nāha! suhatthiṇō vi bhaddattaṇaṁ kaha vahantu?
jāṇa duha ccēya gaī — ekkē mandā, mayā aṇṇē
bahusōhaggāyāō avihavāo vaṭṭanti tujjha vērīṇa
antēurīō...nahu nahu naranāha! nayarīō
harahāsa-haṁsa-hārindu-kunda-balahadda-saṅkhadhavalēṇa
tujjha jasēṇa riūṇaṁ sāhasu kaha mayaliyaṁ vayaṇaṁ?
kamalānilaō vi tumaṁ nāha! na dōsāyarō si sukaī vi
na ya atthalaīō jaṁ tēṇa jaē vimhayaṁ kuṇasi
uddāmapiyālavaṇō saralattaṇajaṇiyajaṇamaṇāṇandō
sasaharakandaravisamō naranāha! tumaṁ himagiri vva
athirā vi thirā lacchī, thirā vi bhamirī taē kayā kittī
aha muyaï cciya tuha daṁsaṇēṇa mahilāyaṇō payaïṁ
samarammi tujjha khaggē vimalattaṇaēṇa jhatti saṅkantā
paḍimāmisēṇa sayalā najjaï saraṇāgayā riuṇō
pāṇiggahiyā vi ciraṁ asiyaṭṭhī tujjha nāha! aïcavalā
aṇurāyapulaïyaṅgī riūṇa kaṇṭhaggahaṁ kuṇaï
kiṁ nāha! imaṁ juttaṁ caürō vaṇṇāi pālayantassa
jaṁ tuha jasēṇa sayalā vi ēkavaṇṇā kayā puhavī?
lacchīē gāḍham āliṅgiō tti iya cintiūṇa kittīē
īsāurēva pecchasu narindabhuvaṇē paribbhamaï ॥
riuramaṇīāṇaṇakāṇaṇēsu vilasantapattavallīō

nīyāō khayaṁ taravārivāriṇā jassa acchariyaṁ
ētadanantaraṁ gāthā śata 200 iti pratau
samarammi jō samaggē vivakkhavaggē palāyamāṇammi
sammuhamappāṇaṁ ciya pecchaï karavālasaṅkantaṁ
paṇaīṇa dēva! dintō bahusō lakkhāiṁ uttuṇō kīsa?
paḍivakkhāṇa vi tuha diti gayavarā rayaṇakōḍīō
jāhē cciya taṁ calaṇē ṇayāṇa uvariṁ karaṁ pasārēsi
lacchī bhuyaṭṭhiyā vō tāhē cciya tēsu saṅkamaï
aggamahisīō jāyā savva cciya patthivā na sandēhō
aṇṇaha khalāhilāsō kaha tāṇa maṇammi vipphuraï?
daṭṭhūṇa tujjha udayaṁ puvvāvara-dakkhiṇottaradisāmu
iya maccharēṇa naravara! peccha ravī rāyamuvvahaï
sañjhāvasarē sañjhāvahūē uvariṁ bhamāḍiūṇa raviṁ
khippaï ārattiyadīvaō vva tuha rāyarāyassa
jassa ya samarē arikumbhipaharasaṅkantamottiō khaggō
arijīaluddhajamajīhadantapantīō uvahasaï
arikumbhikumbhanibbhēyapūraruhiracchaḍāruṇacchāō
parikuviyajamakaḍakkhō vva jassa khaggō raṇē sahaï
alikulakuvalayakajjalatamālanīlammi jassa dhāraharē
saï raṇasarāō nāsanti rāyahaṁsā pavarapakkhā
jassa karē karavālō chajjaï tāvicchagucchasacchāhō
samarammi haḍhāyaḍiḍhayajayalacchīvēṇidaṇḍō vva
arikāmiṇīṇa kuṅkuma-katthūrī-kajjalāiṁ aṅgēsu
jassa karavāladhārājalēṇa sahasa tti dhōāiṁ
jassa asibhiṇṇaarikarikumbhatthalagaliyamottiyagaṇēṇa
bīēṇa va jaṇiā samarabhūmipaḍiēṇa kittilayā
nahayalavisālaphalaē sasaharakhaḍiyāē tārasārīhi

jassa payāvō kittī ya dō vi dīvanti
krīḍhanti iti pratau ṭippaṇī avirāmaṁ
mēhaṁ va sajaladhāraṁ raṇagayaṇasamuṇṇayaṁ tamālanihaṁ
daṭṭhūṇa jassa khaggaṁ palāiyaṁ rāyahaṁsēhi
karikumbhadalaṇasaṁsattamottiō jassa raṇabharē khaggō
sattūṇa saggamaggō vva sahaï nakkhattasañjuttō
samarammi jassa khaggō vibhiṇṇariukumbhikumbharuhirullō
rēhaï jayasiricalaṇālattayapayapantirattō vva
jassa karavāladaṇḍēṇa khaṇḍiā rēhaē raṇamahīē
arikuñjaradantā aṅkura vva najjanti jasataruṇō
virasāiṁ jāiṁ pamuhē, amayarasāyanti jāiṁ pariṇāmē
kajjāiṁ tāiṁ suviyāriyāiṁ na jaṇē hasijjanti
dardurī — dēśīśa. iti pratau ṭippaṇīsālūrī kasiṇabhuyaṅgamassa jaṁ khivaï matthaē calaṇaṁ
taṁ mannē kassa vi mantavāiṇō phuṇō ta phuraï māhappaṁ
ambayaphalaṁ supakkaṁ kuhiyaṁ biṇṭaṁ samuddhaō vāō
sāhā ḍollaṇasīlā na yāṇimō kattha pariṇāmō?
kajjaṁ phalaṁ va sarasaṁ jāyaï niyakālapariṇaīpaḍiya
tamakālē ghippantaṁ duhāvahaṁ hōi virasaṁ ca
tisu jē avutthapuvvā rāyakulē mahiyalē ya sēvāsu
viṇṇāṇa-nāṇa-laṭṭhattaṇāṇa tē bāhirā purisā
siddhaṁ taṁ mannijjaï jaṁ sijjhaï sāma-bhēyanīīē
siddhaṁ pi taṁ asiddhaṁ pahāṇapurisakkhaō jattha
aṇuyattaha bhaṇaha piyaṁ jaṁ kajjaṁ taṁ muṇēha cittēṇa
mahuraṁ lavaï maūrō savisaṁ ca bhuyaṅgamaṁ gilaï
garuyāiṁ ciya sāhaï purisō kajjāiṁ natthi sandēhō
rōsō suraṅgadhūli vva jassa na hu pāyaḍō hōi
suhaḍō na sō payaṅgō āvaṭṭhaï jō jaḍōpaïṭṭhō vva
apahāriyasuhakajjō nikkajjaṁ cēva khaggammi
kaḍuyaṁ pi nāgaraṁ ciya pariṇāmamayaṁ, visaṁ na mahuraṁ pi
riuṇō vi varaṁ suyaṇā, mittāiṁ na uṇa khalapagaī
samaē cciya kīrantā phalanti kiriyā suhā va asuhā vā
mēhāṇaṁ pi jalāiṁ dahanti cittāsu paḍiyāiṁ
kiṁ cojjaṁ ṭhāṇavasēṇa jaṁ asantō vi jāyaē mahimā
saṅghaḍaï mahurimā ghaṇagayāṇa lavaṇōyahijalāṇaṁ
paḍivakkhēsuṁ tēyassiṇā vi cariyavvamappamattēṇa
vuṭṭhīsu ravī purakayavāō cciya payaḍaï payāvaṁ
kimpi payaṁ ahirūḍhō lahuō vi daḍhaṁ tavēi garuyaṁ pi
payatalakaṇṭayalēsō vi dahaï āmatthayaṁ dēhaṁ
avarēhiṁ vi jaṁ sijjhaï tammi kaē kiṁ parassa uvayariyaṁ
taraṇimmi daliyatimirē uvayaraï jaṇassa kiṁ dīvō?
uvayariēsu vi kēsu vi ayasō vipphuraï sajjaṇāṇaṁ pi
maliṇattaṇaṁ pi jattalasōhaṇēṇa vimalāṇa vi karāṇaṁ
dēvagharāṇa vi kāṇa va vaḍḍhantāṇaṁ kamēṇa saṅkōō
kēsiṁ pi pusuṇō jāyaï vitthārō pāyavāṇa vva
lahuēṇa vi guruālambaṇēṇaā avalaṁbaṇēṇa ahiyaṁ lahanti apasaṁsaṁ
nahabhaṅgēṇa vi paḍimāō dēvayāṇaṁ apujjāvvāō
payamunnayamahirōhanti kēvi dunnayapahēṇa vaccantā
mayagahilavibbhamāṇaṁ gayāṇa paviyambhaē agghō
garuyāyanti aṇēgē vasaṇēsu aṇāulā puṇō viralā
vahusō santi mahagghā jalaṇē kaṇayassa puṇa suddhīpuṭṭhī
avalaṁviyaṁ taṇāī vihalaṁ dhāranti ahava tuṭṭanti
avalaṁviya jē na hu taṇasamā vi ki tāṇa uṇa bhaṇimō?
aviyāriūṇa kajjaṁ sahasa cciya jē narā payaṭṭanti
ḍajjhanti tē varāyā dīvasihāē payaṅgō vva
avaraguṇēṇaṁ jāṇaṁ maḍappharō tāṇa nāma kō gavvō?
vāuvasārūḍhanahaṅgaṇāṇa dhūlīṇa kō mahimā?
vaṅkabhaṇiyāiṁ kattō? kattō addhacchipicchiyavvāiṁ?
ūsasiyaṁ pi muṇijjaï chaïllajaṇasaṅkulē gāmē
līlāvalōyaṇēṇa vi muṇanti jē hiyayakajjaparamatthaṁ

siḍhilantā vi siṇēhaṁ chēyā dukkhēṇa najjanti
raccāvanti, na raccati, dinti dukkhaṁ, na dukkhiyā hōnti
asuṇivi ṇiyattaïṇhi dukkhārāhā jaē chēyā
mā ruyasu suyaṇa! chēyāṇa aggaē jhijjhihinti nayaṇāiṁ
na hu bhijjaï tāṇa maṇaṁ vajjaṁ piva salilanivahēṇa
raccanti nēya kassa vi, rattā vi mayacchi! na hu muṇijjanti
diṇakarakara vva chēyā adiṭṭhadōsā niyaṭṭanti
rattē rattā, kasiṇammi kasiṇayā, majjhimammi majjhimayā
phalihamaṇi vva chayallā jattha gayā tattha raṅgillā
jaha paḍhamadiṇē taha pacchimammi pharusāiṁ nēya jampanti
vvōammō chaïllapurisā viraccamāṇā vi dullakkhā
jovvaṇabharēṇa aha maṇḍaṇēṇa hiyayaṁ haranti ramaṇīō
aṅganivēsabhavaṁ ciya chēyā magganti caṅgattaṁ
vivarīyaraē lacchī bambhaṁ daṭṭhūṇa nāhikamalatthaṁ

jaï sā sahīhiṁ bhaṇiā tujjha muhaṁ punnacandasāricchaṁ

maḍayārūḍhā muiyā piyassa muyapāṇiyaṁ dēi

upphulladalaṁ kamalaṁ karēṇa maülāviyaṁ kīsa?

pahaō na piō māṇaṁsiṇīē thōraṁsuyaṁ ruyaṇaṁ

pattē viyālasamaē tā kīsa juyajjuyā sijjā?

dhuyaï saraṁ piyaï jalaṁ taṁ jāṇaha kēṇa kajjēṇaṁ?

chinnaṁ mayassa sīsaṁ taha vi maō taṁ taṇaṁ caraï
amuṇiya payāriharisaṅkarāṇasaddō ṇa ? palāyanti
tāhi ciya garuigamaṇē! hā muddhē! kattha dīsihisi?

ujjhanti phāliūṇaṁ vēsā lēhaṁ va gahiatthaṁ

sāmannasundarīṇaṁ vibbhamamāvahaï aviṇaō cēva

pīō jāīi rasō, dalāiṁ miliyāiṁ sahi! jahicchāē
biṇṭaggaṁ taha vi alī lihaï atittō phuḍaṁ kāmī
mālaïvirahē rē muddha! bhasala! mā ruyasu nibbharukkaṇṭhaṁ
vallahaviōgadukkhaṁ maraṇēṇa viṇā na vīsaraï

sariyādaïyāō ṭhiyā pāusapaōsadaïyassa virahammi

dujjaṇavayaṇēṇa va tāviyāṇa lōyāṇa saraēṇa

piyavirahajalaṇaḍajjhantahiyayadhūmaṁ va uggiraï

pahiyāṇa viṇāsā''saṅkiō vva lacchiṁ vasantassa
pattāṇi (pattā?) jhaḍati, viasati kujjayā, aliaṇāṇa āṇadō
kuppahuvasantasamaē na hu dīsaï viasiā jāī ॥ 1 ॥
iti pratau ṭippaṇī
accantakhaviyadōsō parivaḍḍhiyamittamaṇḍalālōō
kassa na jaṇēi dukkhaṁ gimhō suyaṇō vva vōlintō
gimhē mahaddahāṇaṁ antō sisirāiṁ vāhirunhāiṁ
jāyāiṁ kuviyasajjaṇahiyayasaricchāiṁ salilāiṁ
gimhāvaramajjhanhē pāyā pahiyassa vāluyāuvariṁ
candaṇapaṅka vva ṭhiyā piyāpaüttiṁ suṇantassa
āsuṅghiūṇa aï ē! tanhāvihalē gayammi mayajūhē
jhīṇavihavassa hiyayaṁ phuṭṭaṁ va talaṁ talāyassa
dūsahasantāvabhayā sampaï majjhaṭṭhiē divasanāhē
chāhi va vañchamāṇā chāyā vi gayā tarutalāiṁ
daṭṭhūṇa divasanāhaṁ vaccantaṁ uttarottarapaēsuṁ
parimukkadakkhiṇāsaṁ harisēṇa vivaḍḍhiyā divasā
gimhammi kalijugammi va jaṁ mittō tavaï gottajāyaṁ pi
dōsāyarō jaḍō vi hu suhāi bhavaṇassa taṁ jutta
dīharadiṇammi gimhē aïsayakhiṇṇē ravī sayā pahiō
sayalasarāṇa piyantō karēhiṁ salilāi taṇuēi
asatīṇa namō tāṇaṁ dappaṇasarisēsu jāṇa hiyayēsu
jō ciya gacchaï puraō purisō sō cēya sakamaï
savvassammi vi daḍḍhē taha vi hu hiyayassa nivvuī jāyā
jaṁ tēṇa gāmadāhē hatthāhatthiṁ kuḍō gahiō
haṁsēṇa samaṁ jaha ramaï kamaliṇī taha ya mahuarēṇāvi
siya-kasiṇaṇivvisēsāiṁ hōnti mahilāṇa hiyayāi
sahaücchayaṁ jaṇaṁ dullahaṁ pi dūrāō amha āṇantō
uvayāri jaraya! jīyaṁ pi ninta! na kayāvarāhō si
atthijjaï ninnēhaṁ, bhattē aruī, jaḍammi aïtinhā
vejja! tahā kuṇasu lahuṁ jaha annaṁ majjha paḍihāi
vijja! jarō na hu ēsō ciravāhī cēya kōi sambhūō
uvasamaï salōṇēṇaṁ viḍaṅgajōyāmayarasēṇaṁ
annattha vacca vālaya! nhāyantiṁ kīsa maṁ palōēsi
ēyaṁ rē! jāyābhīruyāṇa tūhaṁ ciya na hōi
pāṇigahiyā vi puraō kayā vi nēhēṇa siccamāṇā vi
thērassa piyā karadīviya vva annāṇamuvayaraï
vaṅkaṁ kō pulaïjjaï? kassa kahijjaï suha va dukkhaṁ vā?
kēṇa va samaṁ hasijjaï? pāmarapaürē hayaggāmē
aïlajjiyamaïbhīyaṁ aïbhūmipalōyaṇaṁ ca aïmāṇaṁ
purisassa mahiliyāē na ya suisīlassa cariyāiṁ
kassa va na hōi rōsō daṭṭhūṇa piyāē savvaṇaṁ ahara?
sabhamarapaümagghāiri! vāriyavāmē! sahasu iṇhiṁ
jāikaliyaṁ na icchasi, kamalaggaṁ muyasi, akkamārūḍhē!
vivarīyasarūvē lacchi! bhamari! ō! vandaṇijjā si
mūlāhintō sāhāṇa sambhavō hōi sayalavacchāṇaṁ
sāhāhiṁ mūlabandhō jēhiṁ kaō tē tarū viralā
kaha taṁ na vandaṇijjaṁ sayalajaṇāṇaṁ pi candaṇaṁ hōi
dōjīhakkantēṇa vi jēṇa na mukkō niyasahāvō
saüṇōvabhōgajoggaṁ ekkaṁ pi phalaṁ na jassa sañjāyaṁ
sō vi hu rukkhō kaha vā jaṇēṇa bhannaï sirīsō tti
chāyārahiyassa nirāsayassa dūrayaradāviyaphalassa
kajjēṇa viṇā jā kā vi vaḍiḍamā tāla! sā tujjha
mottūṇa pattaniyaraṁ jaḍāṇa niyaparimalaṁ samappantō
sahasommūlaṇadukkhaṁ vālaya! vālō si, kiṁ bhaṇimō?
païṁ mukkēṇaṁ taruvara! nāsaï pattattaṇaṁ na pattāṇa
tuha puṇa chāyā jaï hojja tārisī tēhiṁ pattēhiṁ
nāraṅgabhaṅgasañjaṇiyadappahuṅkāraujujjaē tattha
khalu natthi cañcupasarō nāliya! rē ettha nāliyarē
guruvirahasandhi-viggahanimmavaṇē atthi kōi jaï ettha
paḍhamekkamañjari aṅguliṁ va ubbhēi sahayārō
sahayāramañjariṁ vajjiūṇa mahamahiyaparimaloggāraṁ
ahilamaï akkakaliyaṁ kahiṁ pi kiṁ mahuarajuvāṇō
taïya cciya pammukkā tujjha phalāsā palāsa! saüṇēhiṁ
kusumoggamēsu jaïyā hayāsa! kasiṇaṁ kayaṁ vayaṇaṁ
ṭhāṇabbhaṭṭēṇa vi candaṇēṇa ō! peccha naravaīṇaṁ pi
kēṇa vi niyayaguṇēṇaṁ ṇa vandaṇijjō kaō appā?
sisirattaṇāvalēvaṁ vahanti savvē vi divasaviramammi
majjhanhasīyalā jē vayaṁsi! viralā vaṇoddēsā
maṇaharavaṇṇaṁ pi hu kaṇṇiyārakusumaṁ na ēi bhamarālī
rūvēṇa kiṁ va kīraï ?, guṇēṇa chēyā harijjanti
phaṇasēhi samaṁ mahimaṇḍalammi kā taruvarāṇa samasīsī
jō pahiyāruhaṇakikalēsasaṅkiō phalaï bundhammi
jēṇa niō parivuḍiṇḍha tālō aïsaliladāṇasēvāē
tassēya jō na phaliō sō phalihaï kaha nu annassa?
ahalō pattāvariō phalakālē muyasi mūḍha! pattāiṁ
iṇi kāraṇēṇa rē viḍava! mahua tuha ērisaṁ nāma
ekkō cciya uyayagirī sajjaṇacūḍāmaṇī bhuyaṇamajjhē
jō sīsē kāūṇa mittaṁ udayaṁ karāvēi
sō kō vi samuppannō dharāharō kulagirīṇa majjhammi
jassa bhuvaṇāhināhō sūrō vi payāhiṇaṁ kuṇaï
suragiriṇō kiṁ tuṅgattaṇēṇa? kiṁ tassa kaṇayarīddhīē?
pāsē vi bhamantaṁ mittamaṇḍalaṁ jassa atthamiaṁ
uvvahaï navataṇaṅkurarōmañcapasāhiyāiṁ aṅgāiṁ
pāusalacchīi paōharēhiṁ paripilliō viñjhō
jaṇaō suyāi khijjaï vijhō rēvāē kumarīē
mayavasamayarabhamarēhiṁ kō ? viṇā karivarēhi vijhagirī
vijhaṁ viṇā karī vi hu pāvanti parāhavasayāiṁ
ekkassa malayagiriṇō dijjaï rēhā girīṇa majjhammi
jattha ṭhiyakuḍaya-nimbā rukkhā siricandaṇaṁ hōnti
jaha sarasē taha sukkē vi pāyavē vahaï aṇudiṇaṁ viñjhō
ucchaṅgabaddhiyaṁ nīrasaṁ pi garuyā na siḍhilanti
atthaïri! sahaï tuha cēya tuṅgimā mahiharāṇa majjhammi

jāṇa samakkhaṁ kīraï vaṁsacchēō pulidēhiṁ

acchaü aṇṇaṁ pañcāṇaṇassa maggō vi duvvisahō
paharasi jēhi gayandaṁ karālanahapañjarēhi hatthēhiṁ
tēhiṁ ciya paharantō lajjasi na mayanda! hariṇammi?
hā! hā! kaha na marijjaï imiṇā dukkhēṇa jaṁ mayandassa
dīsaï guhā samubbhaḍajambuyapayapanticittaliyā
iha vasa-māsaṁ iha ruhirakaddamaṁ iha hi muttiukkērō
kaïvāraṁ kēsarivilasiyassa maggō cciya kahēi
nisiyakharanaharapaharaṇavibhinnakarikumbhabhāsurakarērāṇaṁ
hariṇāṇa kō virōhō? kā mittī saha mayandēṇa?
līlāniddaliyagayandakumbhapayaḍiyapayāvapasarassa
sīhassa maēṇa samaṁ na viggahō nēya sandhāṇaṁ
niggūḍhapōrisāṇaṁ asaccasambhāvaṇā vi sambhavaï
ekkāṇaṇē vi sīhē jāyā pañcāṇaṇapasiddhī
kharanaharapaharaniddaliyamattamāyaṅgakumbhakēsariṇō
aïdubbalassa vi balaṁ khaṇḍijjaï kiṁ siyālēhiṁ?
hēlāē nisumbhiyakumbhikumbhavihavassa calaṇanahapantī
chippaü chalēṇa niddāluyassa hariṇō vi hariṇēṇa
nibiḍacavēḍaviyāriyakarikumbhocchaliyamottiyanihēṇa
pupphavarisō vva khittō siddhēhiṁ sīhacariyassa
pañcāṇaṇanahamuddaṅkiyāiṁ rēvātaḍāiṁ daṭṭhūṇa
mayapasaraparavasēhiṁ vi gaēhiṁ na hu tattha paribhamiyaṁ
bhuñjanti kasiṇadasaṇā abbhintarasaṇṭhiyā gayandāṇa
jē uṇa vihurasahāvā tē dhavalā vāhira ccēya
dāṇaṁ dintassa vi khaṇaï aṅkusō taha gayandakumbhayaḍaṁ
sīsē vi kayā vaṅkā lōhamayā kaṁ na dūmanti?
dantacchōhaṁ taḍaviḍavimōḍaṇaṁ sarasasallaīlihaṇaṁ
jaï viñjhō cciya na sahaï tā kariṇō kattha vaccanti?
dantullihaṇaṁ savvaṅgamajjaṇaṁ hatthabuḍḍaṇāyāsaṁ
pōḍhagayandāṇa vaṇē puṇō vi jaï nammayā sahaï
taha nīsasiyaṁ jūhāhivēṇa ciravilasiyaṁ sarantēṇa
jaha gahiyaṁ tiṇakabalaṁ sarasaṁ pi hu jhatti pajjaliyaṁ
niyajūhāliddhassa vi vallahaghariṇīmuhaṁ sarantassa
sarasō muṇālakavalō gayassa hatthē cciya milāṇō
ajja vi taṁ saraï gaō majjantō saravarammi līlāē
jaṁ kariṇikaraggummūliēṇa pahaō muṇālēṇa
viyaliyamaēṇa gayajovvaṇēṇa hallantadantamusalēṇa
ajja vi ulaṁ saṇāhaṁ jūhāhivaïṁ jiyantēṇa
rēvāṇaïtīrukkampiēṇa taha kahavi tēṇa nissasiyaṁ
jaha sunnamaṇassa gayaṁ gaēṇa na hu lakkhiyaṁ jīaṁ
rāyaṅgaṇammi parisaṇṭhiyassa jaṁ kuñjarassa māhappaṁ
viñjhagirimmiṁ na tahā ṭhāṇēsu guṇā vivaḍḍhanti
sitthēṇa ki va rittaṁ kariṇō kavalāvasēsapaḍiēṇa
taṁ puṇa tēṇaṁ ciya jiyaï bappuḍaṁ kīḍiyakuḍambaṁ
kaṅkellipallavovvellamaṇaharē jaï vi nandaṇē caraï
karahassa taha vi maruvilasiyāiṁ hiyaē khuḍukkanti
puṇaruttapasāriyadīhakandharō karaha! kiṁ palōēsi?
kattō labbhanti marutthalīō divvē parāhuttē?
taṁ jīhāē vilaggaṁ kiṁ pi phalaṁ māmi! tassa taddiyahaṁ
vokkaraï cakkhiuṁvakkhiōsaṇavaṇāiṁ karahō dhuyaggīvō
nīsasiya ruyasi jhijjhasi jhūrasi cintēsi bhamasi uvviggōubimbō
sā maraṇassa kaēṇaṁ karaha! taē cakkhiā vallī
uyaha mahīharaücchaṅgasaṅgadakkhāē kaha va pattāē
karahēṇa ujjuēṇaṁ aharadalaggaṁ pi na hu mukkaṁ
saralāō navanavāō aṇavarayaṁ jaï vi caraï vallīō
taha vi hu hiyayammi sayā karahōṁ dakkhārasaṁ saraï
apphōḍiyaguruyapayappahāravitthiṇṇajaṇiyakiṇasōhō
dhavalassa mahābharakaḍḍhaṇāiṁ khandhō cciya kahēi
ḍimbhāṇa na sō kuppaï, thērē pariharaï, khamaï kasarāṇa
dhavalāṇa dhavalavasahō na sahaï taṇuyaṁ pi phuṅkāraṁ
dhavalassa nēya bhārō dukkhaï hiyayammi dukkhaē annaṁ
aṇajāṇaēṇa pahuṇā kasarēṇa samaṁ pi jaṁ juttō
cikkaṇacikkhallacahuṭṭacakkathakkē bharammi jāṇihasi
avisēsannū gahavaï! parammuhō jaṁ si dhavalāṇa
amarasirōvari ṭhāṇaṁ laddhaṁ rē! dhayavaḍā! hi abbhahiyaṁ
niyavaṁsassa vi chāyā na kayā tā kīsa pharaharasi?
pāūṇa pāṇiyaṁ saravarāṇa piṭṭhiṁ na dinti sihiḍimbhā
hōhī jāṇa kalāvō payaï cciya sāhaē tāṇa
jaï labbhaï avayāri kaha va ulaggēṇa āvayāpaḍiyaṁ
uvayāramāriyaṁ taha karijja jaha dukkaraṁ jiyaï
divvavasā païṁ jambuya! pattā jaï nāma kēsarissa guhā

navaṇaliṇamuṇālullōlamāliyaṁ haṁsa! māṇasaṁ mottuṁ
lajjāē kaha na maō sēvantō gāmavāhuliaṁ?
mahaṇārambhē mandararavēṇa taha kaha vi bhāmiyā lacchī
jēṇa juantarapattā na tahā vi thirattaṇaṁ lahaï
taṁ natthi jaṁ na kīraï kaṇayaṁpalōhēṇa ettha lōyammi
sūrō vihu atthamaṇē rahēṇa buḍḍō samuddammi
guṇasaṅgēṇa vi guruā jayammi savvattha hōnti gāraviyā
ṭhāṇabbhaṭṭhaṁ ghaṭṭhaṁ vandijjaï candaṇaṁ, uyaha
caḍaï namantāṇa guṇō ārūḍhaguṇāṇa hōi ṭaṅkārō
jaha cāvāṇa narāṇa va guṇaṭaṅkārō, na thaddhāṇa
paharaddhaṁ pi na taviyaṁ ravi-sasiviramē saṇicchara-buhēhiṁ
pāyaḍavaṁsēhiṁ va nippharēhiṁ kiṁ kīraï suēhiṁ?
savvāyarēṇa rakkhaha taṁ purisaṁ jattha jayasirī vasaï
atthamiyammi miyaṅkē tārēhiṁ na kīraē jōnhā
sēsēṇa siraṁ dinnaṁ, piṭṭhī kummēṇa bhuvaṇabhārassa
kajjārambhē sarisē vi antaraṁ hōi garuāṇa
mittaṁ payassa salilēṇa sacchaha jaṁ na hōi kiṁ tēṇa?
biuṇēi milijjantaṁ āvaṭṭaï āvaīpaḍiyaṁḍhamaṁ
taṁ mittaṁ kāyavvaṁ jaṁ mittaṁ vasaṇapattakālammi
ālihiyabhittivāullayaṁ va na parammuhaṁ ṭhāi
dhammē laggā ihalaggaï iha maggaṇā vi pāvanti uttamaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ
guṇasaṅgiṇō phurantā gayaṇaṅgaṇagāmiṇō hunti
tikkhō vi kharō vi salōhaō vi parapīḍagō vi lahuō vi
laggō dhammammi narō sarō vva garuaṁ guṇaṁ lahaï
līlāē kuvalayaṁ kuvalayaṁ va sīsē samuvvahantēṇa
sēsēṇa sēsapurisāṇa purisayārō vi pamhuṭṭhō
pūyaphalēhiṁ ciya kēvalēhiṁ payaḍō na hōi muharāō
jāva na hōi sahāyā niccaṁ saccūnnayā pattā
hārō khittō mahimaṇḍalammi taruṇīē raïsamārambhē
avasararahiyā guṇavantayāguṇiṇōvi dūrē dharijjanti
kassa vi guṇavuḍḍhi cciya uccapayārōhaṇēsu nigaḍāiṁ
aïgāravēṇa picchāṇa nīyanahagāmiṇō sihiṇō
ahiyamahiyaṁ kalāō saṅgahiya sirīē taha kahaṁ raviṇōō
appaṁ hariṇakēṇaṁ sittassa vi jaha na saṅghaḍaï
ūhaï sō kō vi kayā vi bhuvaṇapalhatthaṇāparō paraṇō ?
mahiharasirēsu khēlanti jēṇa racchā iva tanhaṇāiṁ
taṁ kiṁ pi uvalakhaṇḍaṁ kayā vi paramēsarī jaṇaï vasuhā
naravaïcūlākusumēhiṁ jassa kira dijjaē agghō
dīvēsu timirasaṅghāirī i papphuphuraï kā vi sā kantī
taha vi hu pahāvavañjhēsu uvalakhaṇḍēsu maṇisaddō
tassa paīvassa sayaṁ kahaṁ samatthā samatthimaṁ kahiuṁ?
dēvē gayammi sūrē jēṇa na sīyanti vavahārā
taṁ dhavalattaṁ sō kō vi bhuvaṇasantāvalōvagō mahimā
pasusaṅgēṇekkēṇaṁ sasiṇō savvaṁ pi sakalaṅkaṁ
aïvallahēsu kōvō viyambhaē, ahava aïviruddhēsu
annē uṇa avarāhē vi hōnti joggā avekkhāē
aïgaruyamahāvaṁsubbhavāṇa saṅghaḍiyavivihavihavāṇa
tuṭṭanti guṇā aïdhaṭṭhimāē cāvāṇa va narāṇaṁ
sacchāṇa sucittāṇaṁ muttāṇaṁ suttisampuḍaṭhiyāṇaṁ
guṇasaṅgamamalahantāṇa nipphalō jammasaṁrambhō
na hu ettiēṇa hōvōhī maliṇāṇa samunnaīi ghaṇasamaō
kāyavvā ajja vi rāyahaṁsasunnā sarucchaṅgā
abbhatthiyā vi vaṅkā guṇarahiyā nimisamettaraṅgillā
inhiṁ kalijugasamaē surindadhaṇusacchaddā lōyā
santaguṇavippaṇāsē asantadōsubbhavē vi ja dukkhaṁ
taṁ sōsēi samuddaṁ, kiṁ puṇa hiyayaṁ maṇussāṇaṁ?
kīranti jāiṁ jovvaṇavasēṇa aviyāriūṇa kajjāiṁ
vayapariṇāmē sabhāriyāiṁ hiyaēyāiṁ tāiṁ hiyaē khuḍukkanti
daḍḍhō candaṇaviḍavī asēsavaṇarāyamaṇḍaṇaṁ imiṇā
haddhī! chārassa kaē vikkamiyaṁ hayahuyāsassa
divvammi parāhuvuttē pattiyaetti ghaḍiyaṁ pi vihaḍaï narāṇaṁ
vakajjaṁ vāluyadharaṇaṁ va kaha va bandha cciya na ēi
khaṇḍijjaï vihiṇā sasaharō vi, sūrassa hōi atthamaṇaṁ
hayadivvapariṇaīē kavalijjaï kō na kālēṇa?
jalaṇapavēsō cāmīyarassa bhaṇa kaha na jujjaē kāuṁ
haddhī! jassa parikkhanti pattharā māmi! guṇaniyaraṁ
vasaṇāiṁ riddhisamuddhurēsu lōēsu hōnti pāēṇa
asamaggasiriṁ rāhū vi gasaï, na hu jāmiṇīnāhaṁ
dīṇattaṁ kuṇamāṇō jaṇō sayaṁ cēva maraṇamahilasaï
paḍivayaṇaṁ jaṁ kaḍhiṇaṁ taṁ puṇa mayamāraṇaṁ tassatattha
tāva ya kōvāvasarō jāva vivēō maṇē ṇa vipphuraï
jaliyaṁ va bhayavayā huyavahēṇa dhūmō ya viṇiyattō
sayalajaṇanayaṇakaḍuyaṁ nitthāmaṁ taha payāvapabbhaṭṭhaṁ
niyataṇayaṁ dhūmaṁ pecchiūṇa chāraṁ gaō aggī
divasa-nisāghaḍamālaṁ jīviyasalilaṁ jaṇassa ghettūṇaṁ
candāiccavaïllā kāla'rahaṭṭaṁ bhamāḍinti
atthamaṇē chaṇḍijjaï nūṇaṁ sūrō vi niyayakiraṇēhiṁ
